content.value:
Casa Huesped Kiwi Hotel The hotel is located only 2.9 km away from the airport of Bogota and 3.2 km from the transport terminal. It is very close to important roads and shopping centers. The neighborhood is residential, quiet and with commerce around it.

Casa Huesped Kiwi Hotel has two types of accommodation â€“ private and shared rooms. The shared room has 6 single beds, a bathroom and 6 lockers. The beds have their own light, a black out (curtain) and plug for the guest to feel comfortable and with more privacy. There are 10 private rooms, each of them has its private bathroom, LED TV, WiFi, desk, mini bar, clothes rack, closet and intercom.

description.description: Casa Huesped Kiwi Hotel offers private rooms and shared accommodation in a residential neighbourhood of Bogota. The hotel is modern and clean, the rooms are fully equipped and comfortable, also the property offers a delicious breakfast.
